message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer. I really appreciate it, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $13,000. This product offers a lot of value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
